title: Xue Haizi
synopsis: During the Winter season, mother rabbit has to go out, but she is afraid of leaving her son home alone. Her rabbit son decides to make a friend out of the snow to keep him company.
related_anime: ['Xiao Tu Tao Tao De Gushi: Bu Pa Leng De Da Yi', 'Hui Sheng: Xiao Tu Tao Tao De Gushi', 'Bupiao']
